title: Historic Site
lore: I've seen many architectural masterpieces but there are only a few buildings in a city that lets you take a glimpse into the past. Take your time to think about the past and the future. Explore its surroundings and learn its lessons. It might help you in your journey.

title: Scout and explore!
lore: An experienced traveler can also get lost in a new city. Finding a good spot to explore your surrounding can be crucial to your navigation.

title: The Garden of Sculptures
lore: Can anyone travel to the past? Not even a mage can do it, but a sculpture garden can give you quite a good impression. Walk among the great historical figures of the past. Unfortunately, they don't make sculptures of good storytellers, but you have better chances, brave adventurer.

title: Burgler by the river
lore: A goblin has stolen your pocket. I think you should look for him by the local river. Maybe can find him there, maybe not, either way, the view will be astonishing.

title: Poisonous city
lore: In the city poisonous air damaged your lung. You should go hiking on a magical path in the forest to regenerate, but be cheerful the wise magic trees only heal you if you enjoy your journey.

title: The Dragon's attack
lore: A dragon has appeared in the sky over the city. It's dangerous for anyone who stays. Escape from the town, and hide in the forests for a few hours.

title: Historic Site
lore: I can recommend you a historic site in the city. It is even older, than me, hard to imagine, right? Maybe it can also tell you interesting stories.

title: Counting clouds
lore: If you can count the clouds in the sky, I'll pay for your next bier. Here is a little help if you want to get closer.

title: Look into the future, or just enjoy the view
lore: I have heard tales of this place. They say you can look so far, that you can even see your future.

title: Orcs
lore: They say there are orcs pillaging the city. Go to the river, maybe you can find some help there.

title: Local hospitality
lore: The locals have noticed that a great adventurer is in town. They would like to invite you for a meal. It would be rude to refuse such a kind request.

title: The challange of the griff
lore: The Great Griff has challenged your knowledge, you should prepare for his questions. Go to the museum and embrace the knowledge.
